attributes.action: Publish local coronavirus cases daily instead of weekly
attributes.additional_details: Reporting new cases as they happen allows the UK public to protect ourselves by self reducing social contact in worst hit places. This will help to delay the spread. Due to schools etc remaining open, we need to be able to make informed choices to lessen our chances of catching the virus.
attributes.background: Be open, honest and transparent with the reporting of Covid-19 cases in the UK. This means reporting new cases as they happen, including where the cases have been, where they contracted the virus.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Chief Medical Officer has confirmed that daily updates will continue.

You can read his remarks during an appearance before the Health Select Committee at https://committees.parliament.uk/work/81/preparations-for-coronavirus/publications/
